products.name: Basics To Advanced In React
products.long_description: Learn everything from React basics to advanced concepts in this comprehensive course. Explore state management, hooks, routing, and more.

products.name: Django Framework for Beginners
products.long_description: A perfect starting point for learning Django, covering fundamentals like models, views, templates, and much more.

products.name: The Future of Design Systems
products.long_description: Explore the evolution of design systems and how they shape user experiences, development workflows, and design scalability.

products.long_description: This guide takes you from backend basics to advanced concepts, covering server-side technologies, APIs, databases, and security.

products.name: Build a Blockchain from Scratch in Go
products.overview: Build a Blockchain from Scratch in Go
products.long_description: A step-by-step guide to building your own blockchain using Go programming language, exploring concepts like blocks, chains, and transactions.

products.long_description: Master frontend development quickly with this plan, featuring projects on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks.

products.name: Master the Code Review
products.long_description: Learn the best practices and techniques to excel in code reviews, improve code quality, and collaborate effectively.

products.name: Mastering Software Technique
products.long_description: Deep dive into software development techniques, covering architecture, design patterns, testing, and performance optimization.

products.name: Web Development Foundation
products.long_description: Build a solid foundation in web development, learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend integration.

products.name: Mastering Git and GitHub - A Practical Guide
products.overview: Mastering Git and GitHub - A Practical Guide
products.long_description: Learn Git and GitHub through hands-on practice and real-world projects, mastering version control and collaborative workflows.
